Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 在移动网页上显示图像。

span.span: Displays an image on a mobile Web page.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够选择基于设备特征的图像文件。The class provides a way to choose an image file based on device characteristics. 对于某些设备，你可以指定内置映像使用`symbol`： 前缀中的 URL 的一部分属性。For certain devices, you can specify built-in images by using a `symbol` : prefix as part of the URL in the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅特定于设备的一部分。For more information, see the Device-Specific section of the . > [!NOTE] > 如果你的应用程序依赖于无 cookie 会话，或者可能收到来自浏览器的要求无 cookie 会话的请求，使用波形符 ("~") 的路径中可导致无意中创建新的会话和可能会丢失会话数据。If your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("~") in a path can inadvertently result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data. 设置具有路径的属性，如 ("~ / 路径")，解析路径使用("~ / 路径") 之前将其分配给属性。To set a property with a path such as ("~/path"), resolve the path using ("~/path") before assigning it to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用[\<设备特定 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8) Image 控件指定不同的设备的不同映像中的控件。The following code sample code shows how to use a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8) control within an Image control to specify different images for different devices. 如果你有一个名为 Sunshine.gif 的文件，它将显示在 Internet 浏览器。If you have available a file named Sunshine.gif, it will appear in Internet Explorer. 如果在启动 OpenWave phone 等 WML 设备或 CHTML 设备上查看的页面，它将显示为一个 sun 图标。If you view the page on a WML device such as an OpenWave phone or a CHTML device, it will appear as a sun icon. 页还显示浏览器的名称和映像的解析的名称。The page also displays the name of the browser and the resolved name of the image. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileImageSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileImageSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] 以下是``部分`Web.config`文件。The following is the `` section of the `Web.config` file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当设备无法获得图像时显示的替换文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text to display when an image is not available for the device.

summary.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

value.span: 当设备无法获得图像时显示的替换文字。

span.span: The alternate text to display when an image is not available for the device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 替换文字显示在浏览器不支持图像或图像文件不可用。The alternate text appears in browsers that do not support images or where the image file is not available.

value.span: 表明 图像来源的 URL

span.span: The URL of the image source for the

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为各种设备通过提供一套内置的图片，如核心、 阳光、 书籍、 右箭头，和等等，图像[\<设备特定 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8)控件中控件，你可以提供了各种各样的图形，可以集成到设备本身，以及标准 Web 图形。Because various devices provide a set of built-in pictures, such as images for a heart, sunshine, a book, a right arrow, and so on, by using a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8) control within the control, you can provide a wide variety of graphics that can be integrated into the devices themselves, as well as standard Web graphics. 例如，可以指定`symbol:63726`作为属性值的所有设备的需要 WML 标记和作为 Sunshine.gif HTML 设备的属性值。For example, you can specify `symbol:63726` as the property value for all devices that require WML markup, and Sunshine.gif as the property value for HTML devices. 准确解析图像适配器提供值 (如， ，或)。The exact resolution of the value is provided by an image adapter (such as , , or ). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用``控件中控件指定不同的映像，适用于不同设备。The following code example shows how to use a `` control within an control to specify different images for different devices. 如果一个名为 Sunshine.gif 文件可用，它会在 Internet Explorer 中显示。If a file named Sunshine.gif is available, it will appear in Internet Explorer. 如果在启动 OpenWave phone 等 WML 设备或 CHTML 设备上查看的页面，它将显示为一个 sun 图标。If you view the page on a WML device such as an OpenWave phone or a CHTML device, it will appear as a sun icon. 页还显示浏览器的名称和映像的解析的名称。The page also displays the name of the browser and the resolved name of the image. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileImageSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileImageSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] 以下是``Web.config 文件的部分。The following is the `` section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的应用程序依赖于无 cookie 会话，或者可能收到来自浏览器的要求无 cookie 会话的请求，使用波形符 ("~") 的路径中可导致无意中创建新的会话和可能会丢失会话数据。If your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("~") in a path can inadvertently result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data. 设置具有路径的属性，如 ("~ / 路径")，解析路径使用("~ / 路径") 之前将其分配给属性。To set a property with a path such as ("~/path"), resolve the path using ("~/path") before assigning it to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅用于支持软键的设备。This property is used only for devices that support softkeys. 如果此属性为空，`Text`使用的控件属性。If this property is empty, the `Text` property of the control is used. 如果`Text`属性为空或其长度小于 9，`Text`属性用于软键标签。If the `Text` property is empty or its length is less than 9, the `Text` property is used for the softkey label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
